#### Prophages

These elements were annotated from the [PHAST database](http://phast.wishartlab.com/Download.html), using blastx and blastn methods.

* Files:
    * GFF: ``r phast_gff``
    * Summary table: ``r phast_summary``

Summary table overview:

```{r echo=FALSE, comment="", eval=TRUE}
if (!is.na(file.info(phast_summary)$size) && phast_summary != 'na') {
df <- tryCatch(read.delim(phast_summary, header = TRUE, sep = "\t"), warning = function(w) {df <- data.frame()}, error = function(w) {df <- data.frame()})
if (!nrow(df)) {cat("The summary table for this database is empty. Or the database was not used, or no element were found!")} else {df} 
} else {cat("The summary table for this database is empty. Or the database was not used, or no element were found!")}
```
